summary: In 1860s Britain, a boy inventor finds himself caught in the middle of a deadly conflict over a revolutionary advance in steam power.
cast: Anne Suzuki|Masane Tsukayama|Katsuo Nakamura|Manami Konishi|Kiyoshi Kodama|Ikki Sawamura|Susumu Terajima|Osamu Saka|Keiko Aizawa|Rosalind Ayres|Mark Bramhall|Oliver Cotton|Robin Atkin Downes|William Hootkins|Peter Lavin|David S. Lee|Alfred Molina|Oliver Muirhead|Paula J. Newman|Anna Paquin|Moira Quirk|Alan Shearman|Patrick Stewart|Julian Stone|Kim Thomson|Kari Wahlgren
title: Steamboy
